User profile
User Profile is a GreenData service that provides a single account for using the services of the
SaaS personal account
functionality and
marketplace
.
To create a user profile, the user must pass the
registration process
.
In the User Profile:
user data (surname/name) are recorded, which will:
be displayed when the owner/participant of the project is displayed both in their own Personal Account and in the Personal Accounts of other users when working together on the project.
displayed when a user adds a rating/feedback to a purchased product on the marketplace;
the possibility of future product placement on the Marketplace from a representative of a legal entity is provided;
data on the creator of the product placing the application on the marketplace are specified;
payment details are added and an agency agreement is signed between the product creator and GreenData for the possibility of placing a paid product on the marketplace.
Configuring a user profile
User profile settings are located on five tabs:
Account - a tab that contains the user’s account data used when owning a product in the Personal Account, when posting ratings, reviews and publishing products on the marketplace;
Setting
Purpose
Setting up a profile photo.
Basic information
User type
Specifying the user type used for product publishing from a private person. Possible value:
Individual;
Self-employed.
Only one user type is allowed to post products from a private person.
First name
Entering a user’s name.
The value specified during user registration is set by default.
Second name
Entering a user’s second name.
The value specified during user registration is set by default.
Patronymic
Entering the user’s patronymic.
TIN
TIN is used to identify an individual or a self-employed person when publishing products.
After signing
agency agreement
the field is locked, in this case the TIN can be changed only by contacting the support service at
help@greendata.ru
.
Country
User’s registration country. The selection is made from the drop-down list.
Paid product publishing is available only for residents of the Russian Federation.
After signing
agency contract
the field is locked, in this case changing the Country is possible only by contacting the support team at
help@greendata.ru
.
The value specified during user registration is set by default.
Contact details
Phone
Entering the user’s phone number.
E-mail
Displaying the user’s E-mail.
Changing E-mail is available on the “Advanced Settings” tab.
The value specified during user registration is set by default.
My payment details - a tab for adding payment details of an individual/self-employed person.
To publish a
paid
product from an individual, filling out the current tab data is required.
Funds will be transferred to the specified account of the recipient for the purchase of the published product.
To add details, click on the button
and in the opened modal window in the field “Bank” enter the name, BIK, SWIFT or TIN of the recipient’s Bank.
Once you start entering, the name can be selected from the drop-down list.
After selecting a bank, BIK and correspondent account will be filled in automatically, it is required to add the current account number in the “ Recipient’s account” field and click on the “Add” button.
Several current accounts can be added this way. All added accounts are displayed in the table, where they can be edited or deleted.
To make payouts received from the sale of products, the account specified in the “Recipient’s Primary Account” field will be used.
The default value of this field is the first recipient account added to the profile.
To delete a recipient account listed as the main account, select another account first in the “Recipient’s Main Account” field.
Organization - a tab for adding organization data for publishing a product from a representative of an individual.
In the “Name” field it is required to enter the name of the organization.
Once you start entering, the name can be selected from the drop-down list.
After selecting the organization, most of the fields will be filled in automatically, it is possible to additionally specify the industry and the number of employees from the drop-down lists and, if necessary, replace the signatory and
click on the “Save” button.
An organization can be added only once on the Marketplace. If several users try to add the same organization, the system will display a warning notification.
After adding an organization, the “Payment details” tab will be displayed. The process of adding organization details is similar to the one described
earlier
.
To publish a
paid
product from an individual, filling out the current tab data is required.
To delete an added organization, click on the corresponding icon:
It is impossible to delete an organization if there are products with the creator “Individual representative” (even for products with “Draft” status).
If trying to delete such an organization, the system will display a notification with the list of products bound to the organization.
Advanced settings - a tab for changing the password and E-mail of the user.
Only the confirmed current E-mail can be changed.
Agency Agreement - a tab for concluding an agreement between the product creator and GreenData to allow publishing a paid product.
To place paid products on the marketplace, agent contracts must be signed on the corresponding tabs, depending on the type of product creator.
Each type of creator corresponding to a separate tab with an agency agreement.
In order to sign an agency agreement on the “Individual”/“Self-employed” tabs on the
“Account”
tab, the TIN must be specified, the “Russia” country must be selected, and the user type corresponding to the tab must be specified.
Signing the agreement is done by checking the checkbox “I am familiar with the terms and conditions of the Agency Agreement and agree with them”.
The signed agency agreement can only be canceled by contacting the support service at
help@greendata.ru
.
